name: Deadly Nightshade (Xascoria)
description:
A mix of Farming and Bullet-Hell

A game where you have to farm while the crops shoots back at you!

Made for Secret Santa Jam, originally for a giftee that quitted, and latter for [To be revealed]

If you encounter any bugs or have any feedbacks, please let me know in the comments, thank you for playing the game.

Controls:

Left Mouse Button - Use tool on tile, must be close to the target tile

Scroll wheel/Numbers Keys/Inventory Slots - Change tool

Credits: Made by Xascoria.
